title: Hard time - Omicidi in serie (1999) Burt Reynolds

sources.title: Hard time - Omicidi in serie (1999) Burt Reynolds
sources.description:
Logan McQueen (Burt Reynolds) is a no non-sense detective who sometimes bends the rules to get his man. When a suspect is killed, Logan is implicated in the mess. He must now find the real killer all the while staving off a murder charge from the District Attorney's office and the wrath a vengeful mobster who's money was lost in the very same bust that went bad.

Original title: Hard Time
Alternative titles: Logan: Ein Bulle unter Verdacht (Germany), Tiempos difíciles (TV) (Spain), Těžké časy (Czech Republic)

Director: Burt Reynolds
Writers: David S. Cass Sr., Steve Wesley

Main cast:
Burt Reynolds — Det. Logan McQueen
Charles Durning — Det. Charlie Duffy
Robert Loggia — Connie Martin
Mia Sara — Myler
Billy Dee Williams — Leo Barker
Paco Christian Prieto — Catarato Estevez
John D'Aquino — Ray Hertz
Roddy Piper — Randy

Genres: TV Movie, Action, Crime, Drama
Release date: December 13, 1998 (USA)
Filming location: Los Angeles, California (though set in Miami).
